hero.title: Find Your Perfect Camping Adventure
hero.subtitle: Discover amazing campgrounds and book your next outdoor experience
hero.description: Discover, book, and experience the most beautiful campgrounds across Thailand. From misty mountains to pristine beaches, your next adventure awaits in the Land of Smiles.

feature1.title: Easy Booking
feature1.description: Book your camping spot with just a few clicks

feature2.title: Verified Locations
feature2.description: All campgrounds are verified and safe

feature3.title: 24/7 Support
feature3.description: Get help whenever you need it

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in just three simple steps

step1.title: Search & Discover
step1.description: Browse through our curated collection of campgrounds across Thailand's 77 provinces

step2.title: Book Your Stay
step2.description: Choose your dates and secure your spot with our easy booking system

step3.title: Enjoy & Share
step3.description: Experience Thailand's natural beauty and share your adventures with the community

destinations.title: Popular Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Discover Thailand's most sought-after camping locations

chiangMai.description: Mountain camping with cool weather and stunning views

krabi.name: Krabi
krabi.description: Beach camping with crystal clear waters

features.title: Why Choose AdventureMate?
features.subtitle: Everything you need for the perfect camping experience in Thailand

mountainAdventures.title: Mountain Adventures
mountainAdventures.description: Discover pristine mountain campgrounds in Northern Thailand's stunning landscapes.

beachCamping.title: Beach Camping
beachCamping.description: Experience coastal camping along Thailand's beautiful beaches and islands.

jungleRetreats.title: Jungle Retreats
jungleRetreats.description: Immerse yourself in Thailand's lush jungles and national parks.

tripPlanner.title: Trip Planner
tripPlanner.description: Plan your perfect camping adventure with our comprehensive trip planning tools.

testimonials.title: What Our Campers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from real adventurers across Thailand

somchai.name: Somchai
somchai.text: Found amazing mountain camping spots near Doi Inthanon. The booking was seamless and the views were incredible!

nong.name: Nong
nong.text: Beach camping in Krabi was a dream come true. The community reviews helped us choose the perfect spot.

pim.name: Pim
pim.text: As a city dweller, I love escaping to Thailand's national parks. The booking system makes it so easy!

cta.title: Ready for Your Thai Adventure?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of campers discovering Thailand's natural wonders

weather.signInToView: Sign in to view weather data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help with any questions about camping or our platform
contact.description: Have questions about camping, need help with your booking, or want to list your campground? We're here to help you every step of the way.
contact.liveChatDescription: Get instant help during business hours
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Failed to send message. Please try again.

validation.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters long

booking.question: How do I book a campground?
booking.answer: Browse our campground listings, select your dates, and complete the booking process. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my booking?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your booking through your account dashboard. Cancellation policies vary by campground and are clearly stated during booking.

listing.question: How do I list my campground?
listing.answer: Visit our owner registration page to apply. We'll review your application and get back to you within 24 hours.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets. All payments are processed securely through our platform.

hero.title: About AdventureMate
hero.subtitle: Connecting campers with the best campgrounds in Thailand

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AdventureMate is dedicated to making camping accessible, enjoyable, and sustainable for everyone. We believe that nature should be available to all, and we're committed to connecting campers with exceptional campgrounds while supporting local communities.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2023, AdventureMate began with a simple idea: to create a platform that makes finding and booking campgrounds as easy as booking a hotel. What started as a small project has grown into a community of thousands of campers and campground owners across Thailand.
story.paragraph2: We understand the challenges that both campers and campground owners face. Campers struggle to find reliable information about campgrounds, while owners need better ways to reach potential guests. AdventureMate bridges this gap with our comprehensive platform.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We promote eco-friendly camping practices and partner with campgrounds that prioritize environmental conservation.

community.title: Community
community.description: We believe in building strong relationships between campers, campground owners, and local communities.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We maintain high standards for safety and quality, ensuring every listing meets our rigorous criteria.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our platform to provide the best possible experience for our users.

team.title: Our Team
team.intro: AdventureMate is built by a passionate team of outdoor enthusiasts, tech experts, and travel lovers who understand what makes camping special.

development.title: Development Team
development.description: Building the technology that powers your camping adventures

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Here to help you every step of the way

relations.title: Campground Relations
relations.description: Working with owners to provide the best camping experiences

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Adventure?
cta.description: Join thousands of campers who have discovered amazing campgrounds through AdventureMate.

forumEdit.loginRequired: Please log in to edit forum posts.

forumEdit.title: Edit Forum Post
forumEdit.subtitle: Update your forum post and share your thoughts with the community
forumEdit.titlePlaceholder: Enter a descriptive title for your post
forumEdit.contentPlaceholder: Share your thoughts, experiences, or ask your question...
forumEdit.tagsPlaceholder: Enter tags separated by commas (e.g., camping, tent, beginner)
forumEdit.tagsHelp: Add relevant tags to help others find your post. Separate tags with commas.
guidelines: Be respectful and constructive in your posts
Check for similar posts before creating new ones

ownerRegister.title: Become a Campground Owner
ownerRegister.subtitle: Join AdventureMate as a verified campground owner and start earning from your property.

authRequired.title: Create an Account or Sign In
authRequired.description: To register as a campground owner, you need to have an AdventureMate account. This helps us verify your identity and provide you with the best owner experience.

benefits.analytics: 📈 Access to detailed analytics and insights

bankingInformation.title: Banking Information
bankingInformation.description: Banking information is optional but required for receiving payments. You can add this later in your profile settings.
bankingInformation.accountHolderNamePlaceholder: Full name as on bank account

bookingSettings.title: Booking Settings
bookingSettings.description: Configure your default booking settings. You can change these later in your dashboard.
bookingSettings.autoApproveDescription: Automatically approve booking requests without manual review
bookingSettings.allowInstantDescription: Allow guests to book immediately without approval
bookingSettings.applicationReasonPlaceholder: Please provide a brief explanation for your application.

cancellationPolicies.flexible: Flexible - Full refund 24 hours before check-in
cancellationPolicies.moderate: Moderate - Full refund 5 days before check-in
cancellationPolicies.strict: Strict - 50% refund up to 1 week before check-in

validation.accountHolderNameRequired: Account holder name is required when account number is provided
validation.bankNameRequired: Bank name is required when account number is provided

success.title: Your owner application has been submitted and is pending review. You will be notified once it is approved.

ownerRegister.applicationRejectedMessage: Your owner application has been rejected. Please review the reason below and resubmit your application with the necessary corrections.
ownerRegister.applicationPendingMessage: Your owner application is currently under review. We will notify you once a decision has been made.
ownerRegister.applicationUnderReviewMessage: Your owner application is being reviewed by our team. This process typically takes 2-3 business days.
ownerRegister.applicationApprovedMessage: Congratulations! Your owner application has been approved. You can now access the owner dashboard and start managing your campgrounds.

ownerCreateProfile.title: Create Owner Profile
ownerCreateProfile.subtitle: Complete your profile to access the owner dashboard and start managing campgrounds

businessInformation.title: Business Information
businessInformation.description: Provide your basic business details to get started

businessAddress.title: Business Address
businessAddress.description: Provide your business address for verification purposes

bankingInformation.title: Banking Information
bankingInformation.description: Provide banking details for payment processing (optional)

businessSettings.title: Business Settings
businessSettings.description: Configure your default business settings and policies
businessSettings.allowInstantDescription: Allow guests to book immediately without approval

cancellationPolicies.flexible: Flexible - Full refund 24 hours before check-in
cancellationPolicies.moderate: Moderate - Full refund 5 days before check-in
cancellationPolicies.strict: Strict - 50% refund up to 1 week before check-in

validation.accountHolderNameRequired: Account holder name is required when account number is provided
validation.bankNameRequired: Bank name is required when account number is provided

success.title: Owner profile created successfully! You can now access the owner dashboard.
